name: Brown Sugar Assam Black Milk Tea
description: Our classic Assam Black Milk Tea drizzled with thick brown sugar syrup for velvety sweetness. No toppings included.

name: Mango Matcha Cream
description: Matcha cream topper with tropical mango. Choice of whole or oat milk. Contains dairy.

name: Strawberry Matcha Cream
description: Uji matcha blended with strawberry jam and spring matcha cream. Contains dairy.

name: Banana Milk
description: Fresh banana puree with spiced rum caramel and milk. Alcohol is cooked off. Contains dairy.

name: Mango Matcha Latte
description: Uji Matcha with mango syrup and bits. Choice of whole or oat milk.

name: Strawberry Matcha Latte
description: Whisked matcha with strawberry jam and housemade compote, finished with your choice of whole or oat milk.
